 closes the window system. Called automatically at exit

 checks window system initialization status

eolUint  count

Allocated window callbacks for the window.

Parameters:

count the number of callbacks to allocate. Note: if the allocation failed, see the log for errors.

void eol_window_free_if_outside_click ( eolWindow **  win  ) 

automatically frees the window provided if the mouse has clicked outside of the window frame

Parameters:
win a pointer to your window pointer. If freed, it will be set to NULL.

Definition at line 466 of file eol_window.c.

eolComponent* eol_window_get_component_by_id ( eolWindow *  win,
eolUint  id 
)

returns a pointer to the window component with the id provided

Parameters:
win the window to search through
id the id, as provided to the component. Should be unique per window.
Returns:
a pointer to the first (in the case of multiple) component with the provided id, or NULL if not found.

returns a pointer to the window component with the name provided

Parameters:
win the window to search through
name the name, as provided to the component. Should be unique per window.
Returns:

eolVec2D  position

Loads a window from config file and moves it to the position specified.
